item.title: The Snow House
item.description:
Preface

endpreamble

I wrote this story around April 2021 for my parents while trying to communicate my PhD struggles. Itâ€™s heavily simplified with a naive worldview* and was mostly meant to illustrate how drawing a connection can be a hard thing in and of itself + elicit discussion on why one would want to go to the effort to draw such a connection
